title: directx error
body: im getting a direct x error pop up when i try to play, i have direct x 9 installed and all my video card drivers are up to date. i have try the full repair and that didnt help. i also unistalled and reinstalled the game and still no help. someone please help as i have no idea what to do.

replies.body: This could also be some kind of weird permissions issue if League isn't able to call on those DX drivers. Double check that direct x driver just in case, but also run through this [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well. Let me know if that's not helping though!
